name: Jungle Plumber Challenge 3
description:
Jungle Plumber Challenge 3 is a fun plumbing mini game, where you need to connect the pipes. As the king or queen of the plumbers you must fix the leaks to provide water to all the jungle foutains. This game is easy to play but it will require you to think about the best and fastest way to rotate the pipes to fix this plumbing. Are you smart enough to raise this plumber challenge ? Can you connect the pipes in the limited time ? Or do you just prefer to take you time, enjoy the nature and play the endless gaming mode ?

Are you ready to play and have fun ?

After the sucess of Jungle Plumber Challenge 1 and 2, here comes Jungle Plumber Challenge 3, the best game of the serie.

This game is easy to play with cute graphics. Your goal is to survive in the jungle by building a water pipe network ! Simply turn the different pieces by touching them, then connect them together to form a complete water circuit.
- 40 levels
- 3 gaming mode (arcade, timer, endless)
- HD graphics
- Hours of fun

Can you become the best plumber in the jungle!
